newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Capetronic 1996 net returns to profit.
newsitem.headline: Capetronic 1996 net returns to profit.

text.p: Company name Capetronic International Holdings Ltd
NOTE - Capetronic is a television and communication equipment maker.
In prior years, goodwill arising on consolidation was amortised on the straight-line method over a period of 40 years.
During the year, the group retroactively changed its policy in accounting for goodwill in that goodwill is now eliminated against reserves in the year in which it arises.
Goodwill previously amortised amounted to HK$28.19 million.

In restating the results for the prior year on the basis of the new policy, the loss for 1995 has been reduced by HK$14.46 million and the remaining HK$13.73 million has been adjusted against the 1995 opening accumulated losses.
The directors consider that the revised accounting policy gives a fairer presentation of the financial position of the group.
The comparative figure for share earnings has been adjusted accordingly.
Total dividend for year is nil vs nil.
